title: Systems of Linear Equations - Three Variables
body: For the following exercises, solve each system by Gaussian elimination. Answer should be in the form (x,y,z), no decimals. Set free parameters to $$t$$ and s and write each component in the form $$a+bs+ct$$. If the system is inconsistent, write "No solutions".
lesson: 9.2 - Systems of Linear Equations: Three Variables
